topic.title: View and manage schedules
topic.shortdesc: Schedules are managed from the menu Assistance Planning

body.p: Planning allows the user to view scheduled tasks for a ticket or a problem assigned to a technician, group of technicians, or the logged on user and groups.
You can choose the date and time for viewing.

This information is exported in two formats :
Ical in order to integrate the calendar with third-party software
Webcal "protocol" that allows to subscribe a calendar to a third party software on the GLPI planning
body.note: Access to the Ical and Webcal protocol is protected by a security key integrated into the URL. It is possible to regenerate this key from the "Preferences" menu. See and more precisely .
Notes are also displayed in planning.
